dialogue.htmlContent:
#IF(game.getDayNumber() - flags.getSavedLong("elis_eisek_banished_date") >= 1)

The space previously occupied by that [eisek.race]'s stall still hasn't found a new occupant, but at least the ruins and the pile of pulverized produce have been cleared away.

#ELSE

The ruins of that [eisek.race]'s stall still occupy this space. It seems no one has come by to clean up the place yet.

#ENDIF
